member.name: M:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.CdbClient.BalanceRoGroupLoad(TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.BalanceRoGroupLoadRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to rebalance the loads of instances in an RO group. Please note that the database connections to those instances will be interrupted transiently; therefore, you should ensure that your application can reconnect to the databases. This operation should be performed with caution.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.CdbClient.CreateDBInstance(TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to create a monthly subscribed TencentDB instance (which can be a source, disaster recovery, or read-only instance) by passing in information such as instance specifications, MySQL version number, purchased duration, and quantity.
This is an asynchronous API. You can also use the [DescribeDBInstances](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the instance details. If the output parameter `Status` is `1` and the output parameter `TaskStatus` is `0`, the instance has been successfully delivered.
1. You can use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the purchasable instance specifications, and then use the [DescribeDBPrice](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/18566?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the prices of the purchasable instances. 2. You can create up to 100 instances at a time, with an instance validity period of up to 36 months. 3. MySQL v5.5, v5.6, v5.7, and v8.0 are supported. 4. Source instances, read-only instances, and disaster recovery instances can be created. 5. If `Port`, `ParamList`, or `Password` is specified in the input parameters, the instance (excluding basic instances) will be initialized. 6. If `Port`, `ParamTemplateId`, or `AlarmPolicyList` is specified in the input parameters, you need to update your SDK to the latest version.

You can create up to 100 instances at a time, with an instance validity period of up to 36 months. 3. MySQL v5.5, v5.6, v5.7, and v8.0 are supported. 4. member.name: M:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.CdbClient.CreateDBInstanceHour(TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to create a pay-as-you-go TencentDB instance (which can be a source, disaster recovery, or read-only instance) by passing in information such as instance specifications, MySQL version number, and quantity.
This is an async API. You can also use the [DescribeDBInstances](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the instance details. If the `Status` value of an instance is `1` and `TaskStatus` is `0`, the instance has been successfully delivered.
1. You can use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the purchasable instance specifications, and then use the [DescribeDBPrice](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/18566?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the prices of the purchasable instances. 2. You can create up to 100 instances at a time, with an instance validity period of up to 36 months. 3. MySQL 5.5, 5.6, 5.7, and 8.0 are supported. 4. Source instances, disaster recovery instances, and read-only instances can be created. 5. If `Port`, `ParamList`, or `Password` is specified in the input parameters, the instance will be initialized.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.CdbClient.DescribeDBPrice(TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBPriceRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to query the purchase or renewal price of a pay-as-you-go or monthly subscribed TencentDB instance by passing in information such as instance type, purchase duration, number of instances to purchase, memory size, disk size, and AZ. For the price of instance renewal, you can pass in instance name to query.
Note: To query prices in a specific region, you need to use the access point of the region. For more information on access points, see Service Address. For example, to query prices in Guangzhou, send a request to: cdb.ap-guangzhou.tencentcloudapi.com. Likewise, to query prices in Shanghai, send a request to: cdb.ap-shanghai.tencentcloudapi.com.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.CdbClient.DescribeDBPriceSync(TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBPriceRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to query the purchase or renewal price of a pay-as-you-go or monthly subscribed TencentDB instance by passing in information such as instance type, purchase duration, number of instances to purchase, memory size, disk size, and AZ. For the price of instance renewal, you can pass in instance name to query.
Note: To query prices in a specific region, you need to use the access point of the region. For more information on access points, see Service Address. For example, to query prices in Guangzhou, send a request to: cdb.ap-guangzhou.tencentcloudapi.com. Likewise, to query prices in Shanghai, send a request to: cdb.ap-shanghai.tencentcloudapi.com.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.CdbClient.DescribeErrorLogData(TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeErrorLogDataRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to query the error logs of an instance over the past month by search criteria. Note: the HTTP response packet will be very large if it contain a single large error log, which causes the API call to time out. If this happens, we recommend you lower the value of the input parameter `Limit` to reduce the packet size so that the API can respond timely.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.CdbClient.OfflineIsolatedInstances(TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.OfflineIsolatedInstancesRequest)
member.summary:
This API (OfflineIsolatedInstances) is used to deactivate isolated TencentDB instances immediately. The instances must be in isolated status, i.e., their `Status` value is 5 in the return of the [instance list querying API](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1).
This is an asynchronous API. There may be a delay in repossessing some resources. You can query the details by using the [instance list querying API](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1) and specifying the InstanceId and the `Status` value as [5, 6, 7]. If the returned instance is empty, then all its resources have been released.
Note that once an instance is deactivated, its resources and data will not be recoverable. Please do so with caution.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.CdbClient.OfflineIsolatedInstancesSync(TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.OfflineIsolatedInstancesRequest)
member.summary:
This API (OfflineIsolatedInstances) is used to deactivate isolated TencentDB instances immediately. The instances must be in isolated status, i.e., their `Status` value is 5 in the return of the [instance list querying API](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1).
This is an asynchronous API. There may be a delay in repossessing some resources. You can query the details by using the [instance list querying API](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1) and specifying the InstanceId and the `Status` value as [5, 6, 7]. If the returned instance is empty, then all its resources have been released.
Note that once an instance is deactivated, its resources and data will not be recoverable. Please do so with caution.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.CdbClient.OpenDBInstanceEncryption(TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.OpenDBInstanceEncryptionRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to enable the encryption feature for instance data storage, and custom keys are supported.
Note: Before enabling data storage encryption for an instance, you need to perform the following operations:
1. [Initialize an instance](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15873?from_cn_redirect=1).
2. Enable [KMS service](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/kms2)
3. [Grant permission to access KMS](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/cam/role) for TencentDB for MySQL. The role name is `MySQL_QCSRole`, and the preset policy name is `QcloudAccessForMySQLRole`.
This API calling may take up to 10 seconds, causing the client to time out. If it returns `InternalError`, call `DescribeDBInstanceInfo` to confirm whether the backend encryption is enabled successfully.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.CdbClient.OpenDBInstanceEncryptionSync(TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.OpenDBInstanceEncryptionRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to enable the encryption feature for instance data storage, and custom keys are supported.
Note: Before enabling data storage encryption for an instance, you need to perform the following operations:
1. [Initialize an instance](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15873?from_cn_redirect=1).
2. Enable [KMS service](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/kms2)
3. [Grant permission to access KMS](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/cam/role) for TencentDB for MySQL. The role name is `MySQL_QCSRole`, and the preset policy name is `QcloudAccessForMySQLRole`.
This API calling may take up to 10 seconds, causing the client to time out. If it returns `InternalError`, call `DescribeDBInstanceInfo` to confirm whether the backend encryption is enabled successfully.

member.summary: Instance ID in the format of cdb-c1nl9rpv or cdbro-c1nl9rpv. It is the same as the instance ID displayed on the TencentDB Console page.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.AddTimeWindowRequest.Monday
member.summary: Maintenance window on Monday. The format should be 10:00-12:00. You can set multiple time windows on a day. Each time window lasts from half an hour to three hours, and must start and end on the hour or half hour. At least one time window is required in a week. The same rule applies to the following parameters.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.AddTimeWindowRequest.Tuesday
member.summary: Maintenance window on Tuesday. At least one time window is required in a week.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.AddTimeWindowRequest.Wednesday
member.summary: Maintenance window on Wednesday. At least one time window is required in a week.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.AddTimeWindowRequest.Thursday
member.summary: Maintenance window on Thursday. At least one time window is required in a week.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.AddTimeWindowRequest.Friday
member.summary: Maintenance window on Friday. At least one time window is required in a week.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.AddTimeWindowRequest.Saturday
member.summary: Maintenance window on Saturday. At least one time window is required in a week.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.AddTimeWindowRequest.Sunday
member.summary: Maintenance window on Sunday. At least one time window is required in a week.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.AddTimeWindowRequest.MaxDelayTime
member.summary: Maximum delay threshold, which takes effect only for source instances and disaster recovery instances.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateBackupRequest.BackupMethod
member.summary: Target backup method. Valid values: `logical` (logical cold backup), `physical` (physical cold backup), `snapshot` (snapshot backup). Basic Edition instances only support snapshot backups.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateBackupRequest.BackupDBTableList
member.summary: Information of the table to be backed up. If this parameter is not set, the entire instance will be backed up by default. It can be set only in logical backup (i.e., BackupMethod = logical). The specified table must exist; otherwise, backup may fail. For example, if you want to backup tb1 and tb2 in db1 and the entire db2, you should set the parameter as [{"Db": "db1", "Table": "tb1"}, {"Db": "db1", "Table": "tb2"}, {"Db": "db2"} ].

member.summary: Manual backup alias

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.InstanceId
member.summary: ID of the instance to be cloned from

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.SpecifiedRollbackTime
member.summary: To roll back the cloned instance to a specific point in time, set this parameter to a value in the format of "yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss".

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.SpecifiedBackupId
member.summary: To roll back the cloned instance to a specific physical backup file, set this parameter to the ID of the physical backup file. The ID can be obtained by the [DescribeBackups](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15842?from_cn_redirect=1) API.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.UniqVpcId
member.summary: VPC ID, which can be obtained by the [DescribeVpcs](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/215/15778?from_cn_redirect=1) API. If this parameter is left empty, the classic network will be used by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.UniqSubnetId
member.summary: VPC subnet ID, which can be obtained by the [DescribeSubnets](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/215/15784?from_cn_redirect=1) API. If `UniqVpcId` is set, `UniqSubnetId` will be required.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.Memory
member.summary: Memory of the cloned instance in MB, which should be equal to (by default) or larger than that of the original instance

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.Volume
member.summary: Disk capacity of the cloned instance in GB, which should be equal to (by default) or larger than that of the original instance

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.InstanceName
member.summary: Name of the cloned instance

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.SecurityGroup
member.summary: Security group parameter, which can be obtained by the [DescribeProjectSecurityGroups](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15850?from_cn_redirect=1) API

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.ResourceTags
member.summary: Information of the cloned instance tag

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.Cpu
member.summary: The number of CPU cores of the cloned instance. It should be equal to (by default) or larger than that of the original instance.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.ProtectMode
member.summary: Data replication mode. Valid values: 0 (async), 1 (semi-sync), 2 (strong sync). Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.DeployMode
member.summary: Multi-AZ or single-AZ. Valid values: 0 (single-AZ), 1 (multi-AZ). Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.SlaveZone
member.summary: Availability zone information of replica 1 of the cloned instance, which is the same as the value of `Zone` of the original instance by default

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.BackupZone
member.summary: Availability zone information of replica 2 of the cloned instance, which is left empty by default. Specify this parameter when cloning a strong sync source instance.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.DeviceType
member.summary: Resource isolation type of the clone. Valid values: `UNIVERSAL` (general instance), `EXCLUSIVE` (dedicated instance). Default value: `UNIVERSAL`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.InstanceNodes
member.summary: The number of nodes of the clone. If this parameter is set to `3` or the `BackupZone` parameter is specified, the clone will have three nodes. If this parameter is set to `2` or left empty, the clone will have two nodes.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.DeployGroupId
member.summary: Placement group ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.DryRun
member.summary: Whether to check the request without creating any instance. Valid values: `true`, `false` (default). After being submitted, the request will be checked to see if it is in correct format and has all required parameters with valid values. An error code is returned if the check failed, and `RequestId` is returned if the check succeeded. After a successful check, no instance will be created if this parameter is set to `true`, whereas an instance will be created and if it is set to `false`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.CageId
member.summary: Financial cage ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateCloneInstanceRequest.ProjectId
member.summary: Project ID. Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.GoodsNum
member.summary: Number of instances. Value range: 1-100. Default value: 1.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.Memory
member.summary: Instance memory size in MB. Please use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the supported memory specifications.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.Volume
member.summary: Instance disk size in GB. Please use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the supported disk specifications.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.EngineVersion
member.summary: MySQL version. Valid values: `5.5`, `5.6`, `5.7`, `8.0`. You can use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the supported versions.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.UniqVpcId
member.summary: VPC ID. If this parameter is not passed in, the basic network will be selected by default. Please use the [DescribeVpcs](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/215/15778?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the VPCs.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.UniqSubnetId
member.summary: VPC subnet ID. If `UniqVpcId` is set, then `UniqSubnetId` will be required. Please use the [DescribeSubnets](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/215/15784?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the subnet lists.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.ProjectId
member.summary: Project ID. If this is left empty, the default project will be used.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.Zone
member.summary: AZ information. By default, the system will automatically select an AZ. Please use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the supported AZs.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.MasterInstanceId
member.summary: Instance ID, which is required and the same as the primary instance ID when purchasing read-only or disaster recovery instances. Please use the [DescribeDBInstances](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the instance IDs.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.InstanceRole
member.summary: Instance type. Valid values: master (primary instance), dr (disaster recovery instance), ro (read-only instance). Default value: master.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.MasterRegion
member.summary: AZ information of the source instance, which is required for purchasing disaster recovery instances and read-only instances.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.Port
member.summary: Custom port. Value range: [1024-65535].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.ProtectMode
member.summary: Data replication mode. Valid values: 0 (async), 1 (semi-sync), 2 (strong sync). Default value: 0. This parameter can be specified when purchasing primary instances and is meaningless for read-only or disaster recovery instances.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.DeployMode
member.summary: Multi-AZ. Valid value: 0 (single-AZ), 1 (multi-AZ). Default value: 0. This parameter can be specified when purchasing primary instances and is meaningless for read-only or disaster recovery instances.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.SlaveZone
member.summary: AZ information of secondary database 1, which is the `Zone` value by default. This parameter can be specified when purchasing primary instances and is meaningless for read-only or disaster recovery instances.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.BackupZone
member.summary: The availability zone information of Replica 2, which is left empty by default. Specify this parameter when purchasing a source instance in the one-source-two-replica architecture.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.SecurityGroup
member.summary: Security group parameter. You can use the [DescribeProjectSecurityGroups](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15850?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the security group details of a project.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.RoGroup
member.summary: Read-only instance information. This parameter must be passed in when purchasing read-only instances.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.AutoRenewFlag
member.summary: This field is meaningless when purchasing pay-as-you-go instances.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.InstanceName
member.summary: Instance name. For multiple instances purchased at one time, they will be distinguished by the name suffix number, such as instnaceName=db and goodsNum=3, their instance name is db1, db2 respectively.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.ResourceTags
member.summary: Instance tag information.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.DeployGroupId
member.summary: Placement group ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.ClientToken
member.summary: A unique string supplied by the client to ensure that the request is idempotent. Its maximum length is 64 ASCII characters. If this parameter is not specified, the idempotency of the request cannot be guaranteed.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.DeviceType
member.summary: Instance resource isolation type. Valid values: `UNIVERSAL` (general instance), `EXCLUSIVE` (dedicated instance), `BASIC` (basic instance). Default value: `UNIVERSAL`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.ParamTemplateId
member.summary: Parameter template ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.AlarmPolicyList
member.summary: Array of alarm policy IDs, which is `OriginId` obtained through the `DescribeAlarmPolicy` API.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.InstanceNodes
member.summary: The number of nodes of the instance. To purchase a read-only replica or a basic instance, set this parameter to `1` or leave it empty. To purchase a three-node instance, set this parameter to `3` or specify the `BackupZone` parameter. If the instance to be purchased is a source instance and both `BackupZone` and this parameter are left empty, the value `2` will be used, which indicates the source instance will have two nodes.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.Cpu
member.summary: The number of CPU cores of the instance. If this parameter is left empty, the number of CPU cores depends on the `Memory` value.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.AutoSyncFlag
member.summary: Whether to automatically start disaster recovery synchronization. This parameter takes effect only for disaster recovery instances. Valid values: `0` (no), `1` (yes). Default value: `0`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.CageId
member.summary: Financial cage ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.ParamTemplateType
member.summary: Type of the default parameter template. Valid values: `HIGH_STABILITY` (high-stability template), `HIGH_PERFORMANCE` (high-performance template). Default value: `HIGH_STABILITY`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.AlarmPolicyIdList
member.summary: The array of alarm policy names, such as ["policy-uyoee9wg"]. If the `AlarmPolicyList` parameter is specified, this parameter is invalid.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.DryRun
member.summary: Whether to check the request without creating any instance. Valid values: `true`, `false` (default). After being submitted, the request will be checked to see if it is in correct format and has all required parameters with valid values. An error code is returned if the check failed, and `RequestId` is returned if the check succeeded. After a successful check, no instance will be created if this parameter is set to `true`, whereas an instance will be created and if it is set to `false`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.EngineType
member.summary: Instance engine type. Valid values: `InnoDB` (default); `RocksDB`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceHourRequest.Vips
member.summary: The list of IPs for sources instances. Only one IP address can be assigned to a single source instance. If all IPs are used up, the system will automatically assign IPs to the remaining source instances that do not have one.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.Memory
member.summary: Instance memory size in MB. You can use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the supported memory specifications.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.Volume
member.summary: Instance disk size in GB. You can use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the supported disk specifications.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.GoodsNum
member.summary: Number of instances. Value range: 1-100. Default value: `1`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.Zone
member.summary: AZ information. The system will automatically select an AZ by default. You can use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the supported AZs.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.UniqVpcId
member.summary: VPC ID. If this parameter is not passed in, the basic network will be selected by default. You can use the [DescribeVpcs](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/215/15778?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the VPCs.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.UniqSubnetId
member.summary: VPC subnet ID. If `UniqVpcId` is set, then `UniqSubnetId` will be required. You can use the [DescribeSubnets](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/215/15784?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the subnet lists.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.ProjectId
member.summary: Project ID. If this parameter is left empty, the default project will be used. When you purchase read-only instances and disaster recovery instances, the project ID is the same as that of the source instance by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.Port
member.summary: Custom port. Value range: 1024-65535.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.InstanceRole
member.summary: Instance typeA. Valid values: `master` (source instance), `dr` (disaster recovery instance), `ro` (read-only instance).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.MasterInstanceId
member.summary: Instance ID. It is required when purchasing a read-only instance, which is the same as the source instance ID. You can use the [DescribeDBInstances](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the instance ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.EngineVersion
member.summary: MySQL version. Valid values: `5.5`, `5.6`, `5.7`. You can use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the supported versions.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.ProtectMode
member.summary: Data replication mode. Valid values: `0` (async replication), `1` (semi-sync replication), `2` (strong sync replication). Default value: `0`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.DeployMode
member.summary: Multi-AZ or single-AZ. Valid values: `0` (single-AZ), `1` (multi-AZ). Default value: `0`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.SlaveZone
member.summary: Information of replica AZ 1, which is the `Zone` value by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.BackupZone
member.summary: Information of replica AZ 2, which is left empty by default. Specify this parameter when purchasing a source instance in the one-source-two-replica architecture.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.AutoRenewFlag
member.summary: Auto-renewal flag. Valid values: `0` (auto-renewal not enabled), `1` (auto-renewal enabled).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.MasterRegion
member.summary: Region information of the source instance, which is required when purchasing a read-only or disaster recovery instance.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.SecurityGroup
member.summary: Security group parameter. You can use the [DescribeProjectSecurityGroups](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15850?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the security group details of a project.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.RoGroup
member.summary: Read-only instance parameter. This parameter must be passed in when purchasing read-only instances.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.InstanceName
member.summary: Instance name. For multiple instances purchased at one time, they will be distinguished by the name suffix number, such as instnaceName=db and goodsNum=3, and their instance names are db1, db2, and db3, respectively.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.ResourceTags
member.summary: Instance tag information

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.DeployGroupId
member.summary: Placement group ID

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.ClientToken
member.summary: A string unique in 48 hours, which is supplied by the client to ensure that the request is idempotent. Its maximum length is 64 ASCII characters. If this parameter is not specified, the idempotency of the request cannot be guaranteed.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.DeviceType
member.summary: Instance isolation type. Valid values: `UNIVERSAL` (general instance), `EXCLUSIVE` (dedicated instance), `BASIC` (basic instance). Default value: `UNIVERSAL`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.ParamTemplateId
member.summary: Parameter template ID

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.AlarmPolicyList
member.summary: Array of alarm policy IDs, which is `OriginId` obtained through the `DescribeAlarmPolicy` API.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.InstanceNodes
member.summary: The number of nodes of the instance. To purchase a read-only instance or a basic instance, set this parameter to `1` or leave it empty. To purchase a three-node instance, set this parameter to `3` or specify the `BackupZone` parameter. If the instance to be purchased is a source instance and both `BackupZone` and this parameter are left empty, the value `2` will be used, which indicates the source instance will have two nodes.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.Cpu
member.summary: The number of the instance CPU cores. If this parameter is left empty, it will be subject to the `Memory` value.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.AutoSyncFlag
member.summary: Whether to automatically start disaster recovery synchronization. This parameter takes effect only for disaster recovery instances. Valid values: `0` (no), `1` (yes). Default value: `0`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.CageId
member.summary: Financial cage ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.CreateDBInstanceRequest.ParamTemplateType
member.summary: Type of the default parameter template. Valid values: `HIGH_STABILITY` (high-stability template), `HIGH_PERFORMANCE` (high-performance template).

member.summary: The array of alarm policy names, such as ["policy-uyoee9wg"]. If the `AlarmPolicyList` parameter is specified, this parameter is invalid.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.StartTimeMin
member.summary: Earliest start time point of automatic backup, such as 2 (for 2:00 AM). (This field has been disused. You are recommended to use the `BackupTimeWindow` field)

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.StartTimeMax
member.summary: Latest start time point of automatic backup, such as 6 (for 6:00 AM). (This field has been disused. You are recommended to use the `BackupTimeWindow` field)

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.BackupExpireDays
member.summary: Backup file retention period in days.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.BackupMethod
member.summary: Backup mode. Value range: physical, logical

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.BinlogExpireDays
member.summary: Binlog file retention period in days.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.BackupTimeWindow
member.summary: Time window for automatic instance backup.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.EnableBackupPeriodSave
member.summary: Switch for archive backup retention. Valid values: `off` (disable), `on` (enable). Default value:`off`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.BackupPeriodSaveDays
member.summary: Maximum days of archive backup retention. Valid range: 90-3650. Default value: 1080.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.BackupPeriodSaveInterval
member.summary: Archive backup retention period. Valid values: `weekly` (a week), `monthly` (a month), `quarterly` (a quarter), `yearly` (a year). Default value: `monthly`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.BackupPeriodSaveCount
member.summary: Number of archive backups. Minimum value: `1`, Maximum value: Number of non-archive backups in archive backup retention period. Default value: `1`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.StartBackupPeriodSaveDate
member.summary: The start time in the format: yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:SS, which is used to enable archive backup retention policy.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.EnableBackupArchive
member.summary: Whether to enable the archive backup. Valid values: `off` (disable), `on` (enable). Default value: `off`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.BackupArchiveDays
member.summary: The period (in days) of how long a data backup is retained before being archived, which falls between 180 days and the number of days from the time it is created until it expires.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.EnableBinlogArchive
member.summary: Whether to enable the archive backup of logs. Valid values: `off` (disable), `on` (enable). Default value: `off`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.BinlogArchiveDays
member.summary: The period (in days) of how long a log backup is retained before being archived, which falls between 180 days and the number of days from the time it is created until it expires.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.EnableBackupStandby
member.summary: Whether to enable the standard storage policy for data backup. Valid values: `off` (disable), `on` (enable). Default value: `off`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.BackupStandbyDays
member.summary: The period (in days) of how long a data backup is retained before switching to standard storage, which falls between 30 days and the number of days from the time it is created until it expires. If the archive backup is enabled, this period cannot be greater than archive backup period.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.EnableBinlogStandby
member.summary: Whether to enable the standard storage policy for log backup. Valid values: `off` (disable), `on` (enable). Default value: `off`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupConfigResponse.BinlogStandbyDays
member.summary: The period (in days) of how long a log backup is retained before switching to standard storage, which falls between 30 days and the number of days from the time it is created until it expires. If the archive backup is enabled, this period cannot be greater than archive backup period.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupDownloadRestrictionResponse.LimitType
member.summary: Valid values: `NoLimit` (backups can be downloaded over both private and public networks with any IPs), `LimitOnlyIntranet` (backups can be downloaded over the private network with any private IPs), `Customize` (backups can be downloaded over specified VPCs with specified IPs). The `LimitVpc` and `LimitIp` parameters are valid only when this parameter is set to `Customize`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupDownloadRestrictionResponse.VpcComparisonSymbol
member.summary: Valid value: `In` (backups can only be downloaded over the VPCs specified in `LimitVpc`).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupDownloadRestrictionResponse.IpComparisonSymbol
member.summary: Valid values: `In` (backups can only be downloaded with the IPs specified in `LimitIp`), `NotIn` (backups cannot be downloaded with the IPs specified in `LimitIp`).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupDownloadRestrictionResponse.LimitVpc
member.summary: VPCs used to restrict backup download.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeBackupDownloadRestrictionResponse.LimitIp
member.summary: IPs used to restrict backup download.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBInstancesRequest.WithDr
member.summary: Whether instances corresponding to the disaster recovery relationship are included. Valid values: 0 (not included), 1 (included). Default value: 1. If a primary instance is pulled, the data of the disaster recovery relationship will be in the `DrInfo` field. If a disaster recovery instance is pulled, the data of the disaster recovery relationship will be in the `MasterInfo` field. The disaster recovery relationship contains only partial basic data. To get the detailed data, you need to call an API to pull it.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBPriceRequest.Period
member.summary: Instance validity period in months. Value range: 1-36. This field is invalid when querying the prices of pay-as-you-go instances.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBPriceRequest.Zone
member.summary: AZ information in the format of "ap-guangzhou-2". You can use the DescribeDBZoneConfig API to query the configurable values. This parameter is required when `InstanceId` is empty.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBPriceRequest.GoodsNum
member.summary: Number of instances. Value range: 1-100. Default value: 1. This parameter is required when `InstanceId` is empty.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBPriceRequest.Memory
member.summary: Instance memory size in MB. This parameter is required when `InstanceId` is empty.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBPriceRequest.Volume
member.summary: Instance disk size in GB. This parameter is required when `InstanceId` is empty.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBPriceRequest.InstanceRole
member.summary: Instance type. Valid values: `master` (source instance), `dr` (disaster recovery instance), `ro` (read-only instance). Default value: `master`. This parameter is required when `InstanceId` is empty.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBPriceRequest.PayType
member.summary: Billing mode. Valid values: `PRE_PAID` (monthly subscribed), `HOUR_PAID` (pay-as-you-go). This parameter is required when `InstanceId` is empty.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBPriceRequest.ProtectMode
member.summary: Data replication mode. Valid values: `0` (async), 1 (semi-sync), `2` (strong sync). Default value: `0`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBPriceRequest.DeviceType
member.summary: Instance isolation type. Valid values: `UNIVERSAL` (general instance), `EXCLUSIVE` (dedicated instance), `BASIC` (basic instance). Default value: `UNIVERSAL`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBPriceRequest.InstanceNodes
member.summary: The number of the instance. Valid values: `1` (for read-only and basic instances), `2` (for other source instances). To query the price of a three-node instance, set this value to `3`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBPriceRequest.Cpu
member.summary: CPU core count of the price-queried instance. To ensure that the CPU value to be passed in is valid, use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://www.tencentcloud.com/document/product/236/17229) API to query the number of purchasable cores. If this value is not specified, a default value based on memory size will be set.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBPriceRequest.InstanceId
member.summary: Instance ID for querying renewal price. To query the renewal price of the instance, pass in the values of `InstanceId` and `Period`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeDBPriceRequest.Ladder
member.summary: Tiered pay-as-you-go pricing, which is valid only when `PayType` is set to `HOUR_PAID`. Valid values: `1`, `2`, `3`. For more information on tiered duration, visit https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/236/18335.?from_cn_redirect=1

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.DescribeRoMinScaleRequest.MasterInstanceId
member.summary: Primary instance ID in the format of "cdbro-c1nl9rpv". Its value is the same as the instance ID in the TencentDB Console. This parameter and the `RoInstanceId` parameter cannot both be empty. Note: when the parameters are passed in with `RoInstanceId`, the return value refers to the minimum specification to which a read-only instance can be upgraded; when the parameters are passed in with `MasterInstanceId` but without `RoInstanceId`, the return value refers to the minimum purchasable specification for a read-only instance.

member.summary: Database account, including username and domain name.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyAccountPrivilegesRequest.GlobalPrivileges
member.summary: Global permission. Valid values: "SELECT", "INSERT", "UPDATE", "DELETE", "CREATE", "PROCESS", "DROP", "REFERENCES", "INDEX", "ALTER", "SHOW DATABASES", "CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES", "LOCK TABLES", "EXECUTE", "CREATE VIEW", "SHOW VIEW", "CREATE ROUTINE", "ALTER ROUTINE", "EVENT", "TRIGGER", "CREATE USER", "RELOAD", "REPLICATION CLIENT", "REPLICATION SLAVE". Note: When ModifyAction is empty, if `GlobalPrivileges` is not passed in, it indicates the global permission will become ineffective.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyAccountPrivilegesRequest.DatabasePrivileges
member.summary: Database permission. Valid values: "SELECT", "INSERT", "UPDATE", "DELETE", "CREATE", "DROP", "REFERENCES", "INDEX", "ALTER", "CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES", "LOCK TABLES", "EXECUTE", "CREATE VIEW", "SHOW VIEW", "CREATE ROUTINE", "ALTER ROUTINE", "EVENT", "TRIGGER". Note: When ModifyAction is empty, if `DatabasePrivileges` is not passed in, it indicates the permission of the database will become ineffective.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyAccountPrivilegesRequest.TablePrivileges
member.summary: Table permission in the database. Valid values: "SELECT", "INSERT", "UPDATE", "DELETE", "CREATE", "DROP", "REFERENCES", "INDEX", "ALTER", "CREATE VIEW", "SHOW VIEW", "TRIGGER". Note: When ModifyAction is empty, if `TablePrivileges` is not passed in, it indicates the permission of the table will become ineffective.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyAccountPrivilegesRequest.ColumnPrivileges
member.summary: Column permission in the table. Valid values: "SELECT", "INSERT", "UPDATE", "REFERENCES". Note: When ModifyAction is empty, if `ColumnPrivileges` is not passed in, it indicates the permission of the column will become ineffective.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyAccountPrivilegesRequest.ModifyAction
member.summary: When this parameter is not empty, it indicates that the permission will be modified. Valid values: `grant` (grant permission), `revoke` (revoke permission)

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.ExpireDays
member.summary: Backup file retention period in days. Value range: 7-1830.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.StartTime
member.summary: (This parameter will be disused. The `BackupTimeWindow` parameter is recommended.) Backup time range in the format of 02:00-06:00, with the start time and end time on the hour. Valid values: 00:00-12:00, 02:00-06:00, 06:00-10:00, 10:00-14:00, 14:00-18:00, 18:00-22:00, 22:00-02:00.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.BackupMethod
member.summary: Automatic backup mode. Only `physical` (physical cold backup) is supported

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.BinlogExpireDays
member.summary: Binlog retention period in days. Value range: 7-1830. It cant be greater than the retention period of backup files.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.BackupTimeWindow
member.summary: Backup time window; for example, to set up backup between 10:00 and 14:00 on every Tuesday and Sunday, you should set this parameter as follows: {"Monday": "", "Tuesday": "10:00-14:00", "Wednesday": "", "Thursday": "", "Friday": "", "Saturday": "", "Sunday": "10:00-14:00"} (Note: You can set up backup on different days, but the backup time windows need to be the same. If this field is set, the `StartTime` field will be ignored)

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.EnableBackupPeriodSave
member.summary: Switch for periodic archive. Valid values: `off` (disable), `on` (enable). Default value:`off`. When you enable the periodic archive policy for the first time, you need to enter the `BackupPeriodSaveDays`, `BackupPeriodSaveInterval`, `BackupPeriodSaveCount`, and `StartBackupPeriodSaveDate` parameters; otherwise, the policy will not take effect.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.EnableBackupPeriodLongTermSave
member.summary: Switch for long-term backup retention (This field can be ignored, for its feature hasnt been launched). Valid values: `off` (disable), `on` (enable). Default value: `off`. Once enabled, the parameters (BackupPeriodSaveDays, BackupPeriodSaveInterval, and BackupPeriodSaveCount) will be invalid.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.BackupPeriodSaveDays
member.summary: Maximum days of archive backup retention. Valid range: 90-3650. Default value: 1080.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.BackupPeriodSaveInterval
member.summary: Archive backup retention period. Valid values: `weekly` (a week), `monthly` (a month), `quarterly` (a quarter), `yearly` (a year). Default value: `monthly`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.BackupPeriodSaveCount
member.summary: Number of archive backups. Minimum value: `1`, Maximum value: Number of non-archive backups in archive backup retention period. Default value: `1`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.StartBackupPeriodSaveDate
member.summary: The start time in the format of yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:SS, which is used to enable archive backup retention policy.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.EnableBackupArchive
member.summary: Whether to enable the archive backup. Valid values: `off` (disable), `on` (enable). Default value: `off`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.BackupArchiveDays
member.summary: The period (in days) of how long a data backup is retained before being archived, which falls between 180 days and the number of days from the time it is created until it expires.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.BinlogArchiveDays
member.summary: The period (in days) of how long a log backup is retained before being archived, which falls between 180 days and the number of days from the time it is created until it expires.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.EnableBinlogArchive
member.summary: Whether to enable the archive backup of the log. Valid values: `off` (disable), `on` (enable). Default value: `off`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.EnableBackupStandby
member.summary: Whether to enable the standard storage policy for data backup. Valid values: `off` (disable), `on` (enable). Default value: `off`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.BackupStandbyDays
member.summary: The period (in days) of how long a data backup is retained before switching to standard storage, which falls between 30 days and the number of days from the time it is created until it expires. If the archive backup is enabled, this period cannot be greater than archive backup period.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.EnableBinlogStandby
member.summary: Whether to enable the standard storage policy for log backup. Valid values: `off` (disable), `on` (enable). Default value: `off`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupConfigRequest.BinlogStandbyDays
member.summary: The period (in days) of how long a log backup is retained before switching to standard storage, which falls between 30 days and the number of days from the time it is created until it expires. If the archive backup is enabled, this period cannot be greater than archive backup period.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupDownloadRestrictionRequest.LimitType
member.summary: Valid values: `NoLimit` (backups can be downloaded over both private and public networks with any IPs), `LimitOnlyIntranet` (backups can be downloaded over the private network with any private IPs), `Customize` (backups can be downloaded over specified VPCs with specified IPs). The `LimitVpc` and `LimitIp` parameters are valid only when this parameter is set to `Customize`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupDownloadRestrictionRequest.VpcComparisonSymbol
member.summary: Valid value: `In` (backups can only be downloaded over the VPCs specified in `LimitVpc`). Default value: `In`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupDownloadRestrictionRequest.IpComparisonSymbol
member.summary: Valid values: `In` (backups can only be downloaded with the IPs specified in `LimitIp`), `NotIn` (backups cannot be downloaded with the IPs specified in `LimitIp`). Default value: `In`.

member.summary: VPCs used to restrict backup download.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyBackupDownloadRestrictionRequest.LimitIp

member.summary: Whether to rebalance the loads of read-only replicas in the RO group. Valid values: `1` (yes), `0` (no). Default value: `0`. If this parameter is set to `1`, connections to the read-only replicas in the RO group will be interrupted transiently. Please ensure that your application has a reconnection mechanism.

member.summary: Instance ID in the format of cdb-c1nl9rpv or cdbro-c1nl9rpv. It is the same as the instance ID displayed on the TencentDB Console page.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyTimeWindowRequest.TimeRanges
member.summary: Time period available for maintenance after modification in the format of 10:00-12:00. Each period lasts from half an hour to three hours, with the start time and end time aligned by half-hour. Up to two time periods can be set. Start and end time range: [00:00, 24:00].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyTimeWindowRequest.Weekdays
member.summary: Specifies for which day to modify the time period. Value range: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday. If it is not specified or is left blank, the time period will be modified for every day by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.ModifyTimeWindowRequest.MaxDelayTime
member.summary: Data delay threshold. It takes effect only for source instance and disaster recovery instance. Default value: 10.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.RoGroupAttr.RoMaxDelayTime
member.summary: Maximum delay threshold for RO instances in seconds. Minimum value: 1. Please note that this value will take effect only if an instance removal policy is enabled in the RO group.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.RoGroupAttr.RoOfflineDelay
member.summary: Whether to enable instance removal. Valid values: 1 (enabled), 0 (not enabled). Please note that if instance removal is enabled, the delay threshold parameter (`RoMaxDelayTime`) must be set.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.RoGroupAttr.MinRoInGroup
member.summary: Minimum number of instances to be retained, which can be set to any value less than or equal to the number of RO instances in the RO group. Please note that if this value is set to be greater than the number of RO instances, no removal will be performed, and if it is set to 0, all instances with an excessive delay will be removed.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.RoGroupAttr.WeightMode
member.summary: Weighting mode. Supported values include `system` (automatically assigned by the system) and `custom` (defined by user). Please note that if the `custom` mode is selected, the RO instance weight configuration parameter (RoWeightValues) must be set.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.RollbackInstancesInfo.Strategy
member.summary: Rollback policy. Valid values: `table` (ultrafast mode), `db` (faster mode), and `full` (fast mode). Default value: `full`. In the ultrafast mode, only backups and binlogs of the tables specified by the `Tables` parameter are imported; if `Tables` does not include all of the tables involved in cross-table operations, the rollback may fail; and the `Database` parameter must be left empty. In the faster mode, only backups and binlogs of the databases specified by the `Databases` parameter are imported, and if `Databases` does not include all of the databases involved in cross-database operations, the rollback may fail. In the fast mode, backups and binlogs of the entire instance will be imported in a speed slower than the other modes.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceEngineVersionRequest.InstanceId
member.summary: Instance ID in the format of cdb-c1nl9rpv or cdbro-c1nl9rpv. It is the same as the instance ID displayed on the TencentDB Console page. You can use the [instance list querying API](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1) to query the ID, whose value is the `InstanceId` value in output parameters.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceEngineVersionRequest.EngineVersion
member.summary: Version of primary instance database engine. Value range: 5.6, 5.7

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceEngineVersionRequest.WaitSwitch
member.summary: Mode of switch to a new instance. Value range: 0 (switch immediately), 1 (switch within a time window). Default value: 0. If the value is 1, the switch process will be performed within a time window. Or, you can call the [switching to new instance API](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/236/15864?from_cn_redirect=1) to trigger the process.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceEngineVersionRequest.UpgradeSubversion
member.summary: Whether to upgrade kernel minor version. Valid values: 1 (upgrade kernel minor version), 0 (upgrade database engine).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceEngineVersionRequest.MaxDelayTime
member.summary: Delay threshold. Value range: 1-10

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceEngineVersionRequest.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.InstanceId
member.summary: Instance ID in the format of `cdb-c1nl9rpv` or `cdbro-c1nl9rpv`. It is the same as the instance ID displayed on the TencentDB Console page. You can use the [DescribeDBInstances](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/api/236/15872?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the ID, whose value is the `InstanceId` value in output parameters.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.Memory
member.summary: Memory size in MB after upgrade. To ensure that the `Memory` value to be passed in is valid, please use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the specifications of the memory that can be upgraded to.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.Volume
member.summary: Disk size in GB after upgrade. To ensure that the `Volume` value to be passed in is valid, please use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the specifications of the disk that can be upgraded to.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.ProtectMode
member.summary: Data replication mode. Valid values: 0 (async), 1 (semi-sync), 2 (strong sync). This parameter can be specified when upgrading primary instances and is meaningless for read-only or disaster recovery instances.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.DeployMode
member.summary: Deployment mode. Valid values: 0 (single-AZ), 1 (multi-AZ). Default value: 0. This parameter can be specified when upgrading primary instances and is meaningless for read-only or disaster recovery instances.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.SlaveZone
member.summary: AZ information of secondary database 1, which is the `Zone` value of the instance by default. This parameter can be specified when upgrading primary instances in multi-AZ mode and is meaningless for read-only or disaster recovery instances. You can use the [DescribeDBZoneConfig](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/236/17229?from_cn_redirect=1) API to query the supported AZs.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.EngineVersion
member.summary: Version of primary instance database engine. Valid values: 5.5, 5.6, 5.7.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.WaitSwitch
member.summary: Mode of switch to new instance. Valid values: 0 (switch immediately), 1 (switch within a time window). Default value: 0. If the value is 1, the switch process will be performed within a time window. Or, you can call the [SwitchForUpgrade](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/236/15864?from_cn_redirect=1) API to trigger the process.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.BackupZone
member.summary: AZ information of secondary database 2, which is empty by default. This parameter can be specified when upgrading primary instances and is meaningless for read-only or disaster recovery instances.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.InstanceRole
member.summary: Instance type. Valid values: master (primary instance), dr (disaster recovery instance), ro (read-only instance). Default value: master.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.DeviceType
member.summary: The resource isolation type after the instance is upgraded. Valid values: `UNIVERSAL` (general instance), `EXCLUSIVE` (dedicated instance), `BASIC` (basic instance). If this parameter is left empty, the resource isolation type will be the same as the original one.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.Cpu
member.summary: The number of CPU cores after the instance is upgraded. If this parameter is left empty, the number of CPU cores will be automatically filled in according to the `Memory` value.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.FastUpgrade
member.summary: Whether to enable QuickChange. Valid values: `0` (no), `1` (yes), `2` (QuickChange preferred). After QuickChange is enabled, the required resources will be checked. QuickChange is performed only when the required resources support the feature; otherwise, an error message will be returned.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.MaxDelayTime
member.summary: Delay threshold. Value range: 1-10. Default value: `10`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.CrossCluster
member.summary: Whether to migrate the source node across AZs. Valid values: `0` (no), `1`(yes). Default value: `0`. If it is `1`, you can modify the source node AZ.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cdb.V20170320.Models.UpgradeDBInstanceRequest.ZoneId
member.summary: New AZ of the source node. This field is only valid when `CrossCluster` is `1`. Only migration across AZs in the same region is supported.

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.
